div.h2: HSPC Person Name Use value set
div.p: The set of values that describe the manner an individual uses a name.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-hspc-PersonNameUse defines the following codes:

tr.td: A name by which an individual previously identified by.
The name by which an individual prefers to be known by.
The name by which an individual in known by professionally.

name.value: HSPC Person Name Use value set

description.value: The set of values that describe the manner an individual uses a name.

definition.value: A name by which an individual previously identified by.
The name by which an individual prefers to be known by.
The name by which an individual in known by professionally.
